summary: Functional test suite for Conan's Git-based source control integration, covering repository metadata extraction, various cloning scenarios (shallow, tag-specific, subfolders, monorepo, custom arguments), commit retrieval under different repository layouts, and a placeholder for version handling tests.
business_intent: Validate that Conan correctly interacts with Git repositories throughout the package lifecycle, ensuring accurate metadata capture, reliable cloning and source fetching, and proper handling of commits and versions to maintain reproducible builds.
